overview: "Wild at Heart" is a love film directed by Ho Fan and Qian Wenji, starring Shen Guanjun, Yang Yijia, Weng Xuehua, Liu Zhi, Xu Zhen, and Chen Zihong.  It tells the story of a lascivious man carrying his wife around to provoke flowers, which was finally exposed and tortured by four women.
title: Wild at Heart
